Header.title: Sri Krishna PG
Header.paragraph: Living with AC rooms, a Washing Machine, and 5G Wi-Fi. Centrally located near Kailasagiri, the Beach, Main roads, and Parks.

About.paragraph: Located in MVP Colony Sector 10, Vizag, near Kailasagiri and the beach, Sri Krishna Boys PG Hostel offers air-conditioned rooms, a washing machine, and high-speed Wi-Fi. Centrally situated, it's close to markets, main roads, and parks. Enjoy a safe, comfortable stay with all essential amenities.

Services.name: Room Management
Services.text: Efficiently manage rooms with detailed information such as room number, type, status, and rent. Easily add, edit, and view room details.

Services.name: Tenant Management
Services.text: Maintain a comprehensive list of tenants, including their personal details, room assignments, and rent status. Add, edit, and view tenant information with ease.

Services.name: Rent Management
Services.text: Keep track of rent payments and dues. Generate and view payment history, and record new rent payments effortlessly.

Contact.address: M1, Door No 2-39-9, Sector 9&10, Mvp Colony, Visakhapatnam - 530017 (Near Samata College, Apughar Road)

Features.title: Free Wi-Fi
Features.text: Stay connected with our high-speed internet access available throughout the hostel.

Features.title: Home Feel Food
Features.text: Enjoy a delicious and healthy breakfast every morning, included with your stay.

Features.title: Security
Features.text: Keep yourself and your belongings safe within our secure and safe premises.

Features.title: Parking
Features.text: Explore the city with ease by renting a bike directly from the hostel.
